verses.verse: "You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H753>long,<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H7341>broad;<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> shall be <S%H7251>foursquare:<s%> and its <S%H6967>height<s%> shall be <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> its <S%H7161>horns<s%> on its <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6438>corners;<s%> its <S%H7161>horns<s%> shall be of one piece with <S%H6823>it;<s%> and you shall overlay it with <S%H5178>brass.<s%>

You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> its <S%H5518>pots<s%> to take away its <S%H1878>ashes,<s%> its <S%H3257>shovels,<s%> its <S%H4219>basins,<s%> its flesh <S%H4207>hooks,<s%> and its fire <S%H4289>pans:<s%> all its <S%H3627>vessels<s%> you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> of <S%H5178>brass.<s%>

You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H4345>grating<s%> for it of <S%H4639>network<s%> of <S%H5178>brass:<s%> and on the <S%H7568>net<s%> you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5178>bronze<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> in its <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7098>corners.<s%>

You shall <S%H5414>put<s%> it under the <S%H3749>ledge<s%> around the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H4295>beneath,<s%> that the <S%H7568>net<s%> may <S%H5704>reach<s%> <S%H2677>halfway<s%> up the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>
You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H905>poles<s%> for the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> <S%H905>poles<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and <S%H6823>overlay<s%> them with <S%H5178>brass.<s%>

Its <S%H905>poles<s%> shall be <S%H935>put<s%> into the <S%H2885>rings,<s%> and the <S%H905>poles<s%> shall be on the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6763>sides<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> when carrying <S%H5375>it.<s%>
You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> it with <S%H5014>hollow<s%> <S%H3871>planks.<s%> They shall <S%H6213>make<s%> it as it has been <S%H7200>shown<s%> you on the <S%H2022>mountain.<s%>

"You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle:<s%> for the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H8486>southward<s%> there shall be <S%H7050>hangings<s%> for the <S%H2691>court<s%> of fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H753>long<s%> for <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6285>side:<s%>

and its <S%H5982>pillars<s%> shall be <S%H6242>twenty,<s%> and their <S%H134>sockets<s%> <S%H6242>twenty,<s%> of <S%H5178>brass;<s%> the <S%H2053>hooks<s%> of the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> and their <S%H2838>fillets<s%> shall be of <S%H3701>silver.<s%>

Likewise for the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> in <S%H753>length<s%> there shall be <S%H7050>hangings<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> cubits <S%H753>long,<s%> and its <S%H5982>pillars<s%> <S%H6242>twenty,<s%> and their <S%H134>sockets<s%> <S%H6242>twenty,<s%> of <S%H5178>brass;<s%> the <S%H2053>hooks<s%> of the <S%H5982>pillars,<s%> and their <S%H2838>fillets,<s%> of <S%H3701>silver.<s%>

For the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> on the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> shall be <S%H7050>hangings<s%> of <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits;<s%> their <S%H5982>pillars<s%> <S%H6235>ten,<s%> and their <S%H134>sockets<s%> <S%H6235>ten.<s%>
The <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> on the <S%H6924>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H4217>eastward<s%> shall be <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

The <S%H7050>hangings<s%> for the one <S%H3802>side<s%> of the gate shall be <S%H2568>fifteen<s%> <S%H520>cubits;<s%> their <S%H5982>pillars<s%> <S%H7969>three,<s%> and their <S%H134>sockets<s%> <S%H7969>three.<s%>

For the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H3802>side<s%> shall be <S%H7050>hangings<s%> of <S%H2568>fifteen<s%> <S%H5982>cubits;<s%> their pillars <S%H7969>three,<s%> and their <S%H134>sockets<s%> <S%H7969>three.<s%>

For the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> shall be a <S%H4539>screen<s%> of <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> of <S%H8504>blue,<s%> and <S%H713>purple,<s%> and <S%H8144>scarlet,<s%> and fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen,<s%> the work of the <S%H7551>embroiderer;<s%> their <S%H5982>pillars<s%> <S%H702>four,<s%> and their <S%H134>sockets<s%> <S%H702>four.<s%>

All the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> shall be <S%H2836>filleted<s%> with <S%H3701>silver;<s%> their <S%H2053>hooks<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and their <S%H134>sockets<s%> of <S%H5178>brass.<s%>

The <S%H753>length<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> shall be one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> every <S%H2572>where,<s%> and the <S%H6967>height<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> of fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen,<s%> and their <S%H134>sockets<s%> of <S%H5178>brass.<s%>

All the <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> in all its <S%H5656>service,<s%> and all its <S%H3489>pins,<s%> and all the <S%H3489>pins<s%> of the <S%H2691>court,<s%> shall be of <S%H5178>brass.<s%>

"You shall <S%H6680>command<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that they <S%H3947>bring<s%> to you <S%H2134>pure<s%> <S%H2132>olive<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H3795>beaten<s%> for the <S%H3974>light,<s%> to cause a <S%H5216>lamp<s%> to <S%H5927>burn<s%> <S%H8548>continually.<s%>

In the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> <S%H2351>outside<s%> the <S%H6532>veil<s%> which is before the <S%H5715>testimony,<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall keep it in <S%H6186>order<s%> from <S%H6153>evening<s%> to <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> it shall be a <S%H2708>statute<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> throughout their <S%H1755>generations<s%> on the behalf of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
